
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,i;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
              long long a,n1,c1,n2,c2,n,t1,t2,v,k,flag=0;
              long double d,e;
              cin>>a;
              cin>>c1;
              cin>>n1;
              cin>>c2;
              cin>>n2;
              d=(long double)n1/c1;
              e=(long double)n2/c2;
              if(d>e)
              {
                     n=a/n1;
                     for(i=n;i>0;i--)
                     {
                     k=i*n1;
                     t1=i;
                     v=a-k;
                     t2=v/n2;
                     if(v%n2==0)
                     {
                                flag=1;
                                break;
                     }
                     }
              }
              else
              {
                     n=a/n2;
                     for(i=n;i>0;i--)
                     {
                     k=i*n2;
                     t2=i;
                     v=a-k;
                     t1=v/n1;
                     if(v%n1==0)
                     {
                                flag=1;
                                break;
                     }
                     }
              }
              if(flag==1)
              cout<<t1<<" "<<t2<<" "<<t1*c1 + t2*c2<<endl;
              else
              cout<<"0 0 0\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
